  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/1011</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/1011</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">El 2004 és múltiple de 12? Què vol dir ser múltiple?</string>
            <string language="en">Is 2004 a multiple of 12? What does 'being a multiple' mean?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ist 2004 eine Mehrfachverbindungsstelle von 12? 
Was ' seiend ein mehrfaches ' Mittel?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">2004 est-il un multiple de 12 ? Que 'étant 
'un moyen multiple ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">São 2004 um múltiplo de 12? Que  ' sendo '
um meio múltiplo?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">È 2004 un multiplo di 12? Che cosa 'essendo
'una media multipla?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Είναι το 2004 ένα πολλαπλάσιο 12; Τι 
"όντας ένα πολλαπλάσιο" να σημάνει;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva que treballa el concepte de múltiple d'un nombre. Conté activitats d'exercitació i d'autoavaluació amb enllaços a una calculadora virtual com a element de suport.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on multiples of a number. It includes practice and self-assessment activities with the help of a link to an on-screen calculator.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">àlgebra</string>
            <string language="en">algebra</string>
            <string language="es">álgebra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">càlcul</string>
            <string language="en">calculation</string>
            <string language="es">cálculo</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit (SCHLAMM) auf 
Mehrfachverbindungsstellen einer Zahl. Sie schließt Praxis- und
Selbstbewertungsaktivitäten mit Hilfe eines Links zu einem 
Aufbildschirm Rechner ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) sur des 
multiples d'un nombre. Il inclut la pratique et les activités 
de art de l'auto-portrait-assessment avec l'aide d'un lien à une calculatrice de 
sur-écran.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) em múltiplos de 
um número. Inclui atividades da prática e do self-assessment 
com a ajuda de uma ligação a uma calculadora da em-tela.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) sui multipli 
di un numero. Include le attività di valutazione di se stesso e
di pratica con l'aiuto di un collegamento ad un calcolatore dello 
su-schermo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στα 
πολλαπλάσια ενός αριθμού. Περιλαμβάνει τις δραστηριότητες 
πρακτικής και αυτοαξιολόγησης με τη βοήθεια μιας σύνδεσης με έναν
επί της οθόνης υπολογιστή.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Algebra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Berechnung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">algèbre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">calcul</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">álgebra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cálculo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">algebra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">calcolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άλγεβρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υπολογισμός</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
